Module org.kohsuke.github.api
Package org.kohsuke.github

Class GHIssueCommentQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.kohsuke.github.GHIssueCommentQueryBuilder
public class GHIssueCommentQueryBuilder extends Object
Builds a query for listing comments on an issue.

Call various methods that set the filter criteria, then the list() method to actually retrieve the comments. 

 GHIssue issue = ...;
 for (GHIssueComment comment : issue.queryComments().since(x).list()) {
     ...
 }
Author:
Yoann Rodiere
See Also:
